pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulator for Spatially Resolved Transcriptomics // An independent, reproducible, and flexible Spatially Resolved Transcriptomics (SRT) simulation framework that can be used to facilitate the development of SRT analytical methods for a wide variety of SRT-specific analyses. It utilizes spatial localization information to simulate SRT expression count data in a reproducible and scalable fashion. Two major simulation schemes are implemented in 'SRTsim': reference-based and reference-free.
